p.k: New. Desperate Houseknives Two families with several children get on great, until relationships begin to sour as one mother starts to get a little
Camden Ripper When a homeless man found bloody, body parts in a north London dumpster in December 2002, police realised they had a serial killer in the neighbourhood
Texas Tower Sniper The disturbing story of Charles Whitman, an ex-marine who went on a killing spree at the University of Texas at Austin in 1966
81% Trap House When a man is murdered just before Christmas, his family helps detectives in Tulsa, Oklahoma, search for his killers
81% New. Bad Lick & Red Dawn After an Atlanta man is murdered, Detective Egbert suspects he may have been a victim of his own kindness
Avert Your Eyes When Pamela Edwards is found shot through the heart, Joe Kenda must shield her young daughters from the horrendous scene before finding the killer
A Killer Always Rings Twice Detective Kenda investigates two murders in the same apartment block. Are they linked? And if so, can he catch the culprit?
A Bike Ride To Murder When the brutalised body of a San Diego girl was found in a canyon in 1991, detectives unearthed a shocking truth that no one could believe
Luxury, Jealousy And Murder There must be a murderer on the guest list when a business convention's rich organiser is bludgeoned with a barbell in his room
Murder in the Cabin A multi-millionaire's wife blames a robber when her husband is killed. But then the investigation turns up millions of missing dollars
Kidnapped When 15-year-old Jenna Baldwin went missing, her parents and the police thought she'd run away. Was it teenage rebellion or something much more sinister?

p.n: What The Killer Did Next I (6)
p.k: New. Sian Roberts Police thought Manchester mum Sian Roberts's murder was a cut-and-dried case when they got a frantic 999 call from her ex. They couldn't
New. Kelly Cochran The story of a woman who carried out the chilling murder of her lover with her husband, before killing her husband too
Make My Day The documentary series continues as retired Colorado Springs police detective Joseph Kenda reflects on another harrowing case
Secret Life Joe Kenda is stumped for suspects when a woman is found dead in her car. Can he uncover and unravel her mysterious double life in order to find her killer?
The Mutant A mother of eight-year-old triplets is found dead at her home. There are three suspects: her estranged husband, her current boyfriend and a stalker
81% The Standing Ground A dangerous decision sees a high-school student shot to the ground. But who fired the fatal bullet? Detectives race the clock to unearth the truth
New. Deadly Duplex A retiree rents out half his duplex to a troubled family and becomes smitten with the wife after sending her abusive husband packing
New. Mahmuda Khatun After just 33 days of marriage, Mahmuda Khatun fatally stabbed her husband in the chest on his 28th birthday. What drove her to commit
New. Gambling with Death A woman is abducted when an evening at the casino turns into a nightmare, and it's not long before a shocking arrest is made
. ith Van Jones. New. Small Town Reckoning: Van Jones meets Michelle Walter, a teacher who immediately recognises the man who killed her son in a tragic car accident
